page.title: 06CHURCH & SCHOOL FETE BRIDGE
page.content: On Saturday June 15th 1985 a fete was held at Bridge School.It was organized by the Parent-Teachers Association and Bridge Church. I was looking forward to the Fete as I was going in the fancy dress as a Swiss girl,so was Lucy my best pal.The people in fancy dress had to parade through the High Street of Bridge.It was a lovely warm summers day.We had to be at the Red Lion Public House by 1.30pm. The Fete started at 2.00.There were swing boats and pony rides and lots of stalls. Some people gave a gymnastic display. I enjoyed it very much. On June 10th and 11th the children in J2 (my class) brought their bicycles to school to try and learn how to ride safely on the roads.On June 13th we had a test of riding and the Highway Code.We all passed the test.Now we can ride our bikes to school if we like.
